title: Is there a reason why we have to wait half a patch for Chromas to become available?
body:
I've literally had RP put aside for the Vayne Chroma since it was added to the PBE.

Same thing happened with the Tristana and Caitlyn Chromas.

replies.body: Why would you buy chromas? they're the biggest fucking rip off since religion was invented.
Some of them are actually pretty cool. Not to mention that a Re-Skin of a Skin adds that much more Skintimidation.
